name: ios-dynamic-type
description: CSS module for utilizing dynamic type in iOS on the web

scripts.start: tachyons src/ios-dynamic-type.css > css/ios-dynamic-type.css && tachyons src/ios-dynamic-type.css --minify > css/ios-dynamic-type.min.css && tachyons src/ios-dynamic-type.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
